badRequest.msg: The data you've sent to the server has been not understood. Maybe a bug has been implemented or the server runs the wrong version. Please contact @:defaults.support and describe the problem.

forbidden.msg: You're not allowed to do this!

notFound.msg: Cannot access the server and it seems to be unreachable. Please contact @:defaults.support and describe the problem.

server.msg: An internal error occurred! Please contact @:defaults.support and describe the problem.
